tool_description: Optimizes multi-stop routes for technicians visiting multiple service locations, minimizing total travel time and distance while respecting time windows.

service_locations.description: List of service locations to visit

service_durations.description: Service duration in hours for each location

time_windows.description: Time windows for each service location (start-end)

return_to_start.description: Whether technician should return to starting location

max_working_hours.description: Maximum working hours for the day

error_messages: Location count mismatch: service_locations and service_durations arrays must have the same length.
Invalid time window format: Time windows must be in 'HH:MM-HH:MM' format.
Too many locations: Maximum 20 service locations allowed for route optimization.
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [minimize_time, minimize_distance, balanced].
Infeasible route: Cannot create valid route within time constraints and working hours limit.
Invalid working hours: Maximum working hours must be between 4 and 16 hours.
usage: Provide technician_start_location, service_locations, and service_durations arrays. Optionally specify time_windows, optimization_goal, return_to_start flag, and max_working_hours to customize the optimization.

optimized_route.description: Optimized sequence of service location indices

total_travel_time.description: Total travel time in hours for optimized route

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated completion time for all services

route_efficiency_score.description: Route efficiency score compared to unoptimized route (0-100)
